titles.title: Priority for LAX Airport Noise Elimination Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to make Los Angeles International Airport a priority airport for the purposes of receiving grants for airport noise compatibility planning and programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/16/2002--Introduced. Priority for LAX Airport Noise Elimination Act - Amends Federal aviation law to make Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) a priority airport for purposes of receiving grants for airport noise compatibility planning and programs.
